bio:
Hi,

I’m Saad, an established and talented Freelance Graphic Designer with a diverse and detailed portfolio spanning over many satisfied clients.

I offer a full spectrum of Graphic Design services. I don’t just take an idea and build a basic visual of it, I work with my clients to research and brainstorm the perfect image, animation or video/advertisement that will most bolster and represent their brand.

My services include (but are not limited to):

● Graphic Design
● Infographic Design
● Banner Design
● Label & Packaging Designs
● UI/UX Designs
● Icon Design
● Interactive PowerPoint templates
● Unique Business Cards
● GIF Designing
● T-Shirt Design
● Book & Magazine Cover Design
● Silhouette Design
● 2D CAD Drawings & 3D Models
● Photoshop & Illustrator Related Tasks
● MS Word, Excel & PowerPoint Related Tasks
● 2D Animation and Video Development

Whenever I take on and complete any of these tasks, I offer my clients multiple possible designs to ensure we come to a perfect final product. All services are done fast and on budget, and I work to keep communication between myself and the client consistent to be sure all necessary changes or suggestions are taken care of.

If you’re interested in working with me, feel free to let me know! I can answer any questions about my experience, portfolio, design software use (Adobe Suite and AutoCAD), and am happy to consult with you on your projects needs. So please, reach out and let’s get started!

- Set to start the job in a professional manner with 24/7 availability 
- Payment Mode - 25% Upfront - 75% After Project Completion

If Superman had chosen to use his powers to help his alter-ego Clark Kent meet those article deadlines at the Daily Planet, that would have made for a dreadful movie. 

It's quite the moniker I've taken on, and while fighting crime is firmly entrenched on my bucket list, for now espresso, measured servings of Corn Flakes, and spandex, plenty of spandex, keep me pleasantly occupied. A writing superhero at your service.
Hours of operation are 6 days a week, 12-14 hours per day. Payment options are flexible.
